v0.1.0.description:
### Version 0.1.0

- Connects to an Archipelago server
- Randomizes the locations of all inventory items and hats
- Goal is to defeat Corrupt Onion (normal version of the fight)

### Known Issues

- Fire immunity is tied to having picked up the hazmat suit's *location*, not having the *item*
- It's possible that Annie will take both your Mural Doodle and Turnip? at once but only give you one key
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0

v0.1.1.description:
### Version 0.1.1

### Fixes

- Fixed logic around Lost Carrot Baby, Grim Graveyard region connections, and Green Goop delivery

### Known Issues

- Fire immunity is tied to having picked up the hazmat suit's *location*, not having the *item*
- It's possible that Annie will take both your Mural Doodle and Turnip? at once but only give you one key
v0.1.1.title: v0.1.1

v0.1.2.description:
### Version 0.1.2

### Fixes

- Prevent Tots from taking away your Soil Sword (potentially leaving the player without a weapon)
- Fire immunity is now tied to having the Hazmat Suit *item*, not having collected its vanilla *location*

### Updates

- Player must start or continue a game before connecting to AP server (rather than connecting from the main menu, which was causing issues)
- Remember connection info between sessions
- New `quick_start` YAML option: Force up to two early progression items (Soil Sword, Watering Can, Fertilizer) to be in sphere 1 locally.
v0.1.2.title: v0.1.2

v0.1.3.description:
### Version 0.1.3

NOTE: This release only updates the apworld. If you already have the v0.1.2 yaml and client mod, you don't need to re-download them.

### Fixes

- The "Pops' Reward" location now logically requires the "Tot's Letter" item.
v0.1.3.title: v0.1.3
